summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1528, for the improvement of Florence Court, from East Denny Way to Thirty-seventh Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16482 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown on said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
